field.label: Payment Method Enabled
field.comment: Presents Instant as a Payment Method at the generic checkout, which offers the option to create an account for 1-click checkout on future purchases. Instant supports card payments.

field.label: Payment Method Title
field.comment: This is the payment method title used at the checkout page

field.label: Payment Method Sort Order
field.comment: Adjust this to move Instant Pay above or below other payment methods

field.label: Verification Element Enabled
field.comment:
Drives conversions by recognising existing Instant users via the email field to enable 1-click checkout at the generic checkout.
Enabling the Payment Method will enable the Verification Element and ignore this setting.

field.label: Banner Element Enabled
field.comment:
Drives conversions at the generic checkout by presenting Instant Checkout to both logged-in Instant users or website users who have an email linked to an Instant account.
Enabling the Payment Method will enable the Banner Element and ignore this setting.
